lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because:
I am loaning funds to assist women in their endeavours to support themselves  and their families. I want to donate in the name of an angelic child ....Aleena. 
I know that when she is old enough to understand she  will appreciate this action and my hope is that she will someday take the initiative to do the same.
They have a strong and capable Mother that will lead by her amazing example. She will learn much from her and Mom from both her daughters!!!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a lettercarrier delivering the Nation's mail in all kinds of environmental conditions.
I am paid the same wage my male counterparts. In my Union.....equal pay for equal work. Equal rights for all. Human Rights are paramount for all workers!!!

lenders.name: JACOB T
lenders.loan_because: just wanted to help if i could

lenders.name: Chris H.
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel better about this world. I don't want to have my $$ subsumed into a large charity whose CEO gets $200,000+ a year.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an animal doctor, but I am not working right now. I took an oath when I started this career. Most of the oath is not about helping animals, though. It is about helping humans stay safe and healthy, through healthy food and water.

lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to be at a great point in my life and I would like to help others reach the same point - step by step

lenders.name: Vivie

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupation: Student Affairs Administrator in Higher Education
lenders.loan_because:

Additionally, I believe in acting justly and loving mercy.  Micro-lending fits into both.

it is the right thing to do &
it makes me feel good to have the resources to help

lenders.name: Amy and Brent

Pete solves business problems.
